document_data.mainbody:
Wyancott was the leader of an extended family of foresters living in the Forest of Tethir in 1366 DR.
In 1366, Wyancott was a middle-aged man. He had faint-colored hair and narrow features.
Wyancott led his group in a journey from southern Tethir along the Trade Way over the Starspire Mountains to Zazesspur, intending to trade animal skins and bark used for tanning and vegetables used for the manufacture of dyes.
In the spring of the , Wyancott and his wagons were set upon by bandits. Thankfully, they were rescued by Star Protective Services.
